H1: Having #H5 grants  $stl  and removes DoT on  $dth (max 1 time)
J2: On avoiding hits: +1 DMG for melee skills and +2 DMG for next #J6
#J6 : 3 uses limit and removes avoiding buffs but no cooldown
J3: Applying $bld on heroes for better supporting
L1:
#L0 #L5 #L9 : +15% DMG per $neg on self
 but -2 (max -10) $hlh per $neg on self
L3:
Gains Oath on kill: +1% /
 +3% vs Chirurgeon, Death, Shambler, Warlord, Collector /
 +6% vs Lair Bosses (max 66%)

$rui : +Oath% DMG for Non #L0 skills, $exe 1, +1 $sts per hit,
 +Oath/2% DMG to adjacent heroes (3 turns)
#L1 : by default remove 2 $pos but Oath+1% chance to steal all $pos
#L3 : heal is multiplied by additional Oath%
R1:
Round end: if self $brn - gain +1 $brn dealt & +1 $spd (max 3 times);
 if not $brn - remove these bonuses
R3: On constant moving: +1 (max +2) DMG but lose standing $pos

On constant standing: +1 $brn dealt (max +1 $brn dealt & +1 $brn DUR)
 but lose moving $pos
V1: Turn start:  $cnv , each grants +5% $neg RES piercing
V3: On  $cns  effect:  $cnv ( $cns  DUR changed from 3 to 5)
F0:
On 10 $sts : always -2 relationship, add  $tox ,
 clear skills cooldowns, -10% $dth RES, reduce/heal to 30% $hlh
F1:
On 10 $sts : always -2 relationship, add  $tox ,
 clear skills cooldowns, -10% $dth RES, reduce/heal to 30% $hlh
F2:
On 10 $sts : always -2 relationship, add  $tox ,
 clear skills cooldowns, -10% $dth RES, reduce/heal to 30% $hlh
Some skills are locked until low $hlh
F3:
On 10 $sts : always -2 relationship, add  $tox ,
 clear skills cooldowns, -10% $dth RES, reduce/heal to 45% $hlh , +1 $blt dealt
D2: Melee skills while $def : apply -5% $neg RES (3 turns)
D3:
On avoiding hits & $agr : +5% (max +25%) CRT
 but -10% (max -50%) DoT RES

On avoiding hits & $def : +20% (max +100%) DMG dealt
 but +40% (max +200%) DMG received
